description: Chat GPT but with more models and model types. From text, image, video, audio, and more all in one place.
title: Blend AI
introduction: Connect Models, like never before. In the multimodal section, you can connect models that share the same input and output types.
features: Connect models with the same input and output types
Supports both image and video outputs
targetPeople: AI developers, data scientists, and machine learning enthusiasts
